howTo.title: How to Connect
howTo.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to join Lordaeron
howTo.step1Desc: Download World of Warcraft version 3.3.5a (build 12340). You can find it on popular WoW archive sites.
howTo.step2Desc: Open your WoW folder, navigate to Data/enUS/ (or your locale folder), and open realmlist.wtf. Replace its contents with:
howTo.step3Desc: Register on our website using the registration form. Your account will be ready instantly.
howTo.step4Desc: Launch WoW.exe, log in with your credentials, and enjoy Lordaeron!

features.title: Server Features
features.subtitle: Discover what makes Lordaeron unique
features.ratesSubtitle: Balanced rates for an enhanced experience
features.progressionSubtitle: Progress through all WoW raids in order
features.transmogDesc: Customize your gear appearance with the transmog system
features.epicProgressionDesc: Defeat every final boss of each raid in release order — from Vanilla through TBC to WotLK. You must clear each tier before unlocking the next.
features.tankAsDpsDesc: In dungeons, you can queue as Tank while staying in your DPS spec. You'll find a group much faster and receive an automatic bonus to health and threat, but your damage will be reduced.
features.dungeonNoLockDesc: No lockout on dungeons, run them as many times as you want
features.raidResetDesc: All raids reset every 2 days for faster progression
features.crossfactionDesc: Group up with players from both Alliance and Horde
features.aoeLootDesc: Loot all nearby corpses with a single click
features.autolearnSpellsDesc: Automatically learn new spells as you level up
